class.name: elu_robot_arm_framework/RokaeAdapter
class.description:
Rokae robot arm adapter for xMateCR7 and other Rokae robot models. Provides interface for motion control, status monitoring, and real-time communication.
Supported features: - Joint space and Cartesian space motion control - Real-time status monitoring - Path planning and trajectory execution - Safety monitoring and emergency stop - Tool and workspace frame configuration
Compatible models: - xMateCR7/12 - xMateSR3/4 - xMateER3/7
Requirements: - Rokae xCore SDK - Network connection to robot controller - Robot controller version >= v3.0.1
